categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This individual was a Jedi Master serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the final years of the Republic. In 19 BBY, the Jedi was fighting in the Clone Wars alongside their Padawan, the female Chalactan Klossi Anno, when Contingency Order 66—an order to kill the Jedi—was initiated and the Republic's clone troopers turned on their Jedi Generals, who were now labeled as traitors of the Republic. The sacrifice of her Master allowed Anno to escape, while the individual was killed by the clones.
The Jedi was briefly mentioned in Dark Lord: The Rise of Darth Vader, a novel written by James Luceno that was published in November 2005.
